column1: New York City Neighborhood Tabulation Areas (NTA) and Geographic Codes
*Note that "park-cemetery-etc" NTAs, while not contiguous, only represent five unique NTAs; one in each borough.
However, each of these five NTAs may appear more than once in this table, as they may fall in more than one PUMA.

column4:
Public Use Microdata Area (PUMA) 
(NTAs are subareas of PUMAs)

column5:
Community District 
(PUMAs approximate NYC Community  Districts and are not coterminous)
